title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year

Inflation rate compared to previous year is gradually decreasing from 1984 to 1986, slightly constant from 1986 to 1989, gradually increasing from 1989 to 1990, rapidly decreasing from 1990 to 1991, roughly constant from 1991 to 1992, gradually decreasing from 1992 to 1993, rapidly increasing from 1993 to 1994, roughly constant from 1994 to 1997, gradually decreasing from 1997 to 1998, rapidly increasing from 1998 to 2000, slightly constant from 2000 to 2003, gradually decreasing from 2003 to 2004, rapidly increasing from 2004 to 2005, roughly constant from 2005 to 2007, rapidly increasing from 2007 to 2008, rapidly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2012, rapidly decreasing from 2012 to 2016, rapidly increasing from 2016 to 2017, gradually decreasing from 2017 to 2018, rapidly increasing from 2018 to 2019, and lastly gradually constant from 2019 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1990 and 1991.
Max Inflation rate compared to previous year about 6.84 was recorded at Year 1990
Min Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.02 was recorded at Year 2016
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2018.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2018 to 2024.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 1990 to 1996.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 1984 to 1990.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2006 to 2011.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2001 to 2006.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 1996 to 2001.
